tool.name: OTB.ConvertCartoToGeoPoint
tool.description: Convert cartographic coordinates to geographic ones.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_long $output_data_long output_data_lat $output_data_lat name OTB.ConvertCartoToGeoPoint carto.x $carto.x carto.y $carto.y mapproj $mapproj mapproj.utm.zone $mapproj.utm.zone mapproj.utm.northhem $mapproj.utm.northhem mapproj.epsg.code $mapproj.epsg.code prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_long $OutputSection_long.transmissionMode_long transmissionMode_lat $OutputSection_lat.transmissionMode_lat

param.name: carto.x
param.label: X cartographic coordinates in the projection defined by mapproj parameter
param.help: X cartographic coordinates in the projection defined by mapproj parameter

param.name: carto.y
param.label: Y cartographic coordinates in the projection defined by mapproj parameter
param.help: Y cartographic coordinates in the projection defined by mapproj parameter

param.name: mapproj
param.label: Defines the map projection to be used.
param.help: Defines the map projection to be used.

param.name: mapproj.utm.zone
param.label: The zone number ranges from 1 to 60 and allows defining the transverse mercator projection (along with the hemisphere)
param.help: The zone number ranges from 1 to 60 and allows defining the transverse mercator projection (along with the hemisphere)

param.name: mapproj.utm.northhem
param.label: The transverse mercator projections are defined by their zone number as well as the hemisphere. Activate this parameter if your image is in the northern hemisphere.
param.help: The transverse mercator projections are defined by their zone number as well as the hemisphere. Activate this parameter if your image is in the northern hemisphere.

param.name: mapproj.epsg.code
param.label: See www.spatialreference.org to find which EPSG code is associated to your projection
param.help: See www.spatialreference.org to find which EPSG code is associated to your projection

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_long
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_lat
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This application computes the geographic coordinates from cartographic ones. User has to give the X and Y coordinate and the cartographic projection (see mapproj parameter for details).
